explains: v. 限制，约束；强迫，迫使

sentences.en: Reduced operation of the machinery should limit their production and thereby constrain the damage.
sentences.cn: 要减少机器的操作，就应该限制它们的生产，从而降低损害。

sentences.en: Sometimes environments constrain those people and sometimes environments give those people opportunity.
sentences.cn: 有时环境会限制这些人，而有时环境会给这些人机会。
策略文档是用来约束上传的。
